snippet: Miami third baseman Casey McGehee and Seattle pitcher Chris Young were selected as Major League Baseball’s comeback players of the year.
abstract: Miami Marlins third baseman Casey McGehee and Seattle Mariners pitcher Chris Young are selected as Major League Baseball's comeback players of 2014.
lead_paragraph: Miami third baseman Casey McGehee and Seattle pitcher Chris Young were selected as Major League Baseball’s comeback players of the year.

headline.main: Marlins’ McGehee and Mariners’ Young Named Comeback Players of the Year
